info.name: Gitter Dark by viluon
info.description: A grey Gitter theme with blue details.
info.additionalInfo:
Gitter Dark is now on GitHub! Stuff changed:
  • Square avatars
  • Grey backgrounds for side panels and chat
  • Open Sans font
  • Text input area has a slightly higher font size
  • Buttons are blue by default
  • Unread messages badges are blue
  • Commits use yellow and a transparent background instead of dark violet
  • Dropdowns, menus, and autocomplete are grey with white text
This style is an adaptation of ylluminarious' Dark Gitter, which is in turn an improvement over MATU's Dark Gitter, which is in turn derived from Dark Gitter by RampantLeaf.
